channel.description: Recent content in EIOA on Blog of Kai

item.title: Global Sustainability Accounting—Developing EXIOBASE for Multi-Regional Footprint Analysis
item.description: A global multi-regional input−output database (EXIOBASE) with a focus on environmentally relevant activities, allowing insights into the production-related impacts and consumption footprints1.

item.title: GIA in the EIOA class: exploring the impact of Brexit (2)
item.description: The Brexit topic from the BBC News. (The Brexit topic link/Group drive)

item.title: GIA in the EIOA class: exploring the impact of Brexit (1)
item.description: UK companies can and should see the current high-uncertainty environment as a spur to rethink their supply chain strategies and make them more resilient.

item.title: Impacts of COVID-19 and fiscal stimuli on global emissions and the Paris Agreement
item.description: Published:22 December 2020 Authors: Yuli Shan, Jiamin Ou, Daoping Wang, Zhao Zeng, Shaohui Zhang, Dabo Guan & Klaus Hubacek https://www.

item.title: EIOA Class: Integrated Group Assignment(IGA)
item.description:
Each group is expected to perform a research question about two real-world issues: BREXIT and national stimulus plans.
in a post COVID-19 world.
